title: Back to the Future: Tales From the Time Train
description: What does the future hold for the Brown family? Find out what happens to Doc, Clara, Jules, and Verne after the end of BTTF Part III!It's 1893, and at last, Doc Brown fulfills his promise to Clara as he completes the project he's been working on: the Time Train! But where in time and space will the Brown family go on their adventures? And what could possibly go wrong if and when they get there?Includes a new introduction by Bob Gale and a bonus supplement, the Time Train Technical Manual, with drawings and photos of the development process that have never been seen before!
author: Bob Gale
